title: Rain In My Heart: A Thriller
description: Kate Archer is desperate to catch the eye of her latest crush, Leon. She's counting on a nice boy like Leon to heal her damaged heart. One thing she definitely isn't counting on is that her town is about to be declared a major disaster zone...Six teenagers. One school. And a flood of epic proportions. Trapped alone with no sign of rescue, Kate and friends face a dreadful should they stay where they are or should they attempt an escape? Both options are dangerous, but what they've yet to realise is that the biggest danger they'll have to face isn't actually the flood...It's each other.
author: Kara Karnatzki
